pages.text: Source: Star Trek$(p)Abbreviation: Tr$(p)Further Reading: $(l:https://memory-alpha.fandom.com/wiki/Tritanium)Star Trek Wiki$(/l)

Tritanium was an ore known to be 21.4 times as hard as diamond. It was found, among other places, on the planet Argus X. (TOS: "Obsession") The ability to melt tritanium was beyond Federation weapons technology in 2364. (TNG: "The Arsenal of Freedom")
